title: RIOT IM TIRED OF MY CLIENT CRASHING AND I LOSE IP AND HAVE TO WAIT
body: Ok... so first off before u say run your repair tool or delete and re download... update windows or so on so forth... atleast 3 times a day my client will crash not for HEXTECH crafting but just when i click accept the Q it will go in and then freeze if im lucky i can relog in time.. but even sometimes when i do i cant ban because all my icons are locked and i cant see anything JUST HAPPENED now im sitting waitng 5 or so mins and lost LP for nothing... NOT CAUSE I WANTED TO DODGE OR LOSE LP .. OR JUST WASTE MY TIME I SPENT WINNING THE FEW GAMES BEFORE IVE EVEN LOST MY PROMOS TWICE OVER THIS... SEE I WENT THRU UR HELP PAGES I LOOKED AT PEOPLES FIXES BUT YET IM STILL LOSING .. this didnt happen till a few patches ago and I WANT SOMETHING DONE.. I help support a game i get no support on... so please someone from riot explain this to me.. even if u have a million times...O AND IM RUNNIN A WIRED CONNECTION NO WIFI EITHER... ITS like 2 am im the only one on my router.. no packets lost here RIOT NEXT EXCUSE.... Check ur coding plz...

replies.body:
It's not really fair to suggest you're not getting support when I've answered another thread you created, and I can only reciprocate as much as I get in constructive details of your issue.  

When you are accepting the queue, the server is grabbing everyone and grouping them together.  If your network is having trouble, then you end up getting left behind or lose sync completely.  You'll end up staring at a blank screen or missing assets during champion select.  Use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide and follow each step individually to resolve this.  Test it out in a custom game to prevent further penalties on your account.  I can show you the way, but you'll need to put in the work!
